Sales Manager Job at Staffora Global Limited




        
    

        
        Staffora Global Limited - Our client, a growing skincare brand, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Manager

Job Location: Igbo-Efon, Lekki - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Beauty / Wellness

Job Summary


	Our client is looking to hire an experienced Sales Manager to drive revenue growth and expand market presence.
	The ideal candidate must have hands-on experience in the skincare or beauty industry and a proven ability to drive sales, manage teams, and build strong customer relationships.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Develop and execute sales strategies to meet and exceed sales targets
	Drive sales across retail, distributors, and other sales channels
	Manage, coach, and motivate the sales team to achieve performance goals
	Build and maintain strong relationships with key clients and partners
	Monitor market trends, competitors, and customer needs
	Prepare sales reports and provide regular performance updates.


Requirements


	Proven experience as a Sales Manager within the skincare or beauty industry
	Strong track record of driving sales and revenue growth
	Excellent leadership, communication, and negotiation skills
	Ability to work independently and deliver results
	Good understanding of skincare products and customer behavior.


What We’re Looking For


	Results-driven and commercially minded
	Strong passion for skincare and beauty
	Strategic thinker with hands-on execution ability.


Salary
N110,000 Monthly

  "title": "Cashier",
  "description": "Fresh2Go Smoothie &amp; Co. is a fast growing food and beverage brand focused on delivering fresh, tasty, and affordable meals and drinks. We operate multiple outlets and specialize in smoothies, milkshakes, sandwiches, shawarma, parfaits, burgers, and other ready to eat meals made with quality ingredients.

Our company is driven by a strong commitment to hygiene, customer satisfaction, and operational excellence. We create a dynamic and supportive work environment where teamwork, innovation, and personal growth are encouraged. At Fresh2Go, employees are valued as key contributors to our success, and we are passionate about building a brand that customers trust and talents are proud to be part of.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Cashier

Job Location:&nbsp;Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Fresh2Go Smoothie &amp; Co. is a fast-growing food and beverage brand committed to providing fresh, healthy, and high-quality meals and drinks.
	We are seeking a reliable and customer-focused Cashier to manage daily sales transactions, provide excellent customer service, and support smooth outlet operations.


Key Responsibilities


	Handle POS transactions accurately
	Issue receipts to customers
	Maintain proper daily sales reports
	Provide courteous and efficient customer service
	Assist in maintaining cleanliness and organization at the cashier area
	Follow operational guidelines, safety, and hygiene procedures
	Support the outlet team when needed.


Educational Qualification


	Minimum of SSCE
	OND, NCE, or higher qualification is an added advantage.


Experience:


	Previous experience as a cashier, sales assistant, or customer service role is an advantage
	Fresh graduates can apply; on-the-job training will be provided.


Required Skills:


	Good numerical and basic accounting skills
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced environment
	Honest, reliable, and detail-oriented
	Ability to work as part of a team.


Other Requirements:


	Neat, hygienic, and professional appearance
	Willingness to work shifts, weekends, and public holidays
	Honest, punctual, and disciplined
	Ability to work with minimal supervision.


Remuneration


	Competitive salary (N55,000 - N70,000 monthly)
	Allowances and performance-based incentives
	Opportunities for career growth within the company.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a brief cover note to:&nbsp;fresh2go01@gmail.com&nbsp;using the position and the preferred outlet (Challenge, Bodija, Akala, Oluyole, Dugbe, Akobo, Jericho, or Apete; Example: &ldquo;Cashier &ndash; Bodija Outlet&rdquo; as the subject of the mail.

Cashier Job at Fresh2Go Smoothie & Co.




        
    

        
        Fresh2Go Smoothie & Co. is a fast growing food and beverage brand focused on delivering fresh, tasty, and affordable meals and drinks. We operate multiple outlets and specialize in smoothies, milkshakes, sandwiches, shawarma, parfaits, burgers, and other ready to eat meals made with quality ingredients.

Our company is driven by a strong commitment to hygiene, customer satisfaction, and operational excellence. We create a dynamic and supportive work environment where teamwork, innovation, and personal growth are encouraged. At Fresh2Go, employees are valued as key contributors to our success, and we are passionate about building a brand that customers trust and talents are proud to be part of.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Cashier

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Fresh2Go Smoothie & Co. is a fast-growing food and beverage brand committed to providing fresh, healthy, and high-quality meals and drinks.
	We are seeking a reliable and customer-focused Cashier to manage daily sales transactions, provide excellent customer service, and support smooth outlet operations.


Key Responsibilities


	Handle POS transactions accurately
	Issue receipts to customers
	Maintain proper daily sales reports
	Provide courteous and efficient customer service
	Assist in maintaining cleanliness and organization at the cashier area
	Follow operational guidelines, safety, and hygiene procedures
	Support the outlet team when needed.


Educational Qualification


	Minimum of SSCE
	OND, NCE, or higher qualification is an added advantage.


Experience:


	Previous experience as a cashier, sales assistant, or customer service role is an advantage
	Fresh graduates can apply; on-the-job training will be provided.


Required Skills:


	Good numerical and basic accounting skills
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced environment
	Honest, reliable, and detail-oriented
	Ability to work as part of a team.


Other Requirements:


	Neat, hygienic, and professional appearance
	Willingness to work shifts, weekends, and public holidays
	Honest, punctual, and disciplined
	Ability to work with minimal supervision.


Remuneration


	Competitive salary (N55,000 - N70,000 monthly)
	Allowances and performance-based incentives
	Opportunities for career growth within the company.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a brief cover note to: fresh2go01@gmail.com using the position and the preferred outlet (Challenge, Bodija, Akala, Oluyole, Dugbe, Akobo, Jericho, or Apete; Example: “Cashier – Bodija Outlet” as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
